page.title: 18SPORT & LEISURE IN OATLANDS
page.content: The Hammerain club has been open for 3 years.It has 18 snooker tables and 1 match room which is the best in the whole of Northern England.Hammerain club was a raincoat factory until 1979 when it was bought by its present owner.It has 2 huge indoor bowling greens,there are 2 400 members and its hoped that there will be 3000 at the end of 1985.Oatlands Mount Working Mens Club is the oldest in Harrogate. It was opened in late 19th Century. The club is open 7 days a week.The barman employs his wife and there is an 82 year old doorman.They make Â£3000 a week in entertainment and beer sales.They have a few sports like Snooker,Darts,dominoes,Pool,billiards which they play against other clubs.
